Built on groundbreaking technology, Jus Mundi was shaped by former lawyers and tech visionaries. Beyond providing access, it drives accessibility, ensuring every individual and professional is equipped with democratized arbitration tools. We're looking for Full-Stack Developers to join our quickly growing team and help us invent how we learn about the world in VR.

Your goal is to design, architect & implement applications to support our ambition to build the largest collection of educational and documentary immersive VR content.

You will work in feature team and should be comfortable with autonomy and ownership of large areas of the product.



















ASAP



At Wonda VR, we are on a mission to revolutionize how we discover and learn about the world around us.

Founded by an award-winning team of creative storytellers and software engineers, we design intuitive tools and robust solutions to make the most of emerging VR, AR & MR technologies.

Our flagship product: Wonda VR Studio & Publishing Suite, is an all-in-one mobile/desktop application to create and share immersive learning & discovery experiences easily and beautifully on all platforms.

In 1 year, our platform has been chosen by over 5,000 creators, educators and communicators working for top brands and institutions such as Ebay, Cisco, NYU, Pearson or Harvard University.
